    • Class ballcourt.Ball extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • BALL_DIAM

          int BALL_DIAM
          Diameter of the ball

        • x

          int x
          Position vector (x-ccordinate of upper left "courner" of the ball)

        • y

          int y
          Position vector (y-ccordinate of upper left "courner" of the ball)

        • dx

          int dx
          Velocity vector, x-component

        • dy

          int dy
          Velocity vector, y-component

        • bc

          BallCourt bc
          The BallCourt the ball is in

        • r

          java.util.Random r
          Random number generator for adding changes to ball velocity and direction.

        • previousHit

          boolean previousHit
          Flag indicating that we hit the ball previously

      • Serialized Fields
